2001: A Film Odyssey, The 7th Annual Filmmakers Forum - included Is Digital the Death of Cinema?, What is the Black Experience on Film?, What’s a Documentary For?, Dragons on the Doorstep: New Asian Cinema, The Tarantino Tutorial: Quentin Tarantino Celebrates Unsung American Master William Witney, Part I-IV - seminar guests included Quentin Tarantino, Richard T. Jameson, Whatever Happened to Talking Pictures?, What’s a Film Critic For?, Fly Filmmaking

Asian Beat: Focus on Thailand Special Presentation Tears of the Black Tiger

Asian Beat: Focus on Thailand - included 6ixtynin9, Bang Rajan, Nang Nak, Iron Ladies

Archival Treasures - included Baraka, Diary of a Chambermaid, If…, Miracles, A Real Young Girl

Black Experience on Film - included Lift, Body and Soul, Bronx-Barbes, Faat-Kine, Little Senegal, MacArthur Park, Middle Passage, Stranger Inside

Edge of Midnight: Adrenaline Rush - included City of Lost Souls, Wild Zero, Dead or Alive, Battle Royale

Edge of Midnight: Erotic City - included Maîtresse, 0 Fantasma, A Real Young Girl, Baise-moi (Rape Me)

Documentaries: Truth with an Attitude - included 23 feature films

Drive-in Party - included Top of the Food Chain, The American Astronaut

Films4Families - included The Dinosaur Hunter, Little Crumb, Ramayana: Prince of Light, The Testimony of Taliesin Jones

Gala Screening: 0

Gala Screening: Liam

Gala Screening: Ghost World

Gala Screening: Tortilla Soup

Golden Space Needle Award

New American Cinema - included 31 feature films

New Directors Showcase - included 12 feature films

On location: Shooting in Seattle - included Farewell to Harry, Cityscapes, Emotional Landscapes, Where Worlds Collide

Secret Festival

Shorts programs - included Mind Games, Oddballs, Eccentrics and Misfits, A Sense of Dislocation, Animation Extravaganza, Modern Sex and Romance, Queersville

The Silent Movie Poster Auction

Special Archival Presentation - included Steamboat Bill, Jr. Accompanied by Boston’s Alloy Orchestra, Seven Men from Now

Special Benefit Presentation: The Endurance: Shackleton’s Legendary Antarctic Expedition

Tribute to Jean-Jacques Beineix - included Mortal Transfer, IP5: Island of the Pachyderms, Roselyne and the Lions, Betty Blue L’Integral, Diva
